long_description: The no-hassle, twist-and-go thirtytwo Boa(R) snowboard boots for kids offer parent-free closure. Kids will go from spinning the reel to spinning the pipe in no time! Soft-flexing boots offer support and comfort for any kid and all types of riding. Boa lacing offers on-the-fly micro adjustments and never comes untied; you get quick on and off, and consistent closure without pressure points. Integrated EVA foam liners hold feet tight and keep them warm. Durable rubber outsoles with EVA cushioning provide all-day comfort and support during landings.
short_description: The no-hassle, twist-and-go thirtytwo Boa(R) snowboard boots for kids offer parent-free closure. Kids will go from spinning the reel to spinning the pipe in no time!
